runs.comm: struck on the ribs! Nipped back in sharply from a good length on the off stump, was surprised by the movement and hit fiercely
plenty of movement, bowled at 137 kmph, swung in after pitching on a length outside off, came forward to defend, it nipped back to strike him high on the pads
135.9 kmph this time, in the channel outside off, a hint of inward movement, Nazir lets it go
Nazir's having a tough time, beaten by the pace and the movement again, swinging it in consistently, clips the pads and lobs up to slip
held it back slightly, Nazir came down the track and tapped it down towards midwicket
starts with a maiden, short of a good length on the off, moves across and fends it into the leg side
pitches it up outside off, driven through the line to mid-off
fullish on the off, moves away and he tries to whip it through midwicket, flies off the outside edge down to third man for a single
Streaky couple, made room and the bowler chased him, targeted the blockhole, Nazir managed to squeeze it out to the vacant midwicket region and stole a couple
short of a good length outside off, zipping away, leaves it be
bowled on a length outside off, comes down the track and tries to drive it hard through mid-off, misses as it swings away, Watling collects
fullish outside off, makes room to drill it through the off side, it zips away to beat the outside edge
shortish on the off, moving in, taps it back to the bowler off the back foot
hurled it short outside off, it darted back in and he knocked it down in front of the bowler
excellent shot, it was there to be hit, full outside off, leans forward and drives it crisply between extra cover and cover point for a boundary
four more, more like Twenty20 now, short on middle, swivels and helps it down the fine-leg boundary past a diving Butler
a touch fuller, gets forward, waits for it to come in and knocks it back to Bond
swing and a miss, didn't bounce as much as he expected, short and he tried to dispatch it over midwicket, zipped under the bat
hurls it on a good length outside off at 131.6 kmph, gets forward and slices it uppishly to third man for a single
bowled full outside off, gets to the pitch and drives it down to mid-on
picked the gap, not too full but he was in position, getting forward and creaming it through the covers for a boundary
bowled from wide of the crease and angled it towards middle, flicked it away towards fine leg for a single
misses out on the pull, bowled it short on middle, tried to smack it through square leg, missed and was struck high on the pads

dropped, very tough chance, came down the track and attempted to deposit it into the stands over the long-on boundary, didn't connect well, got plenty of elevation but Butler, running back from mid-on, spilled it through his outstretched hands, just about managed to reach it but the effort was in vain
he's welcomed with a six, lands on a good length on the off, bends low and slaps it with utter disdain over long-on for a flat six
on the off side this time, pitched up and he clubbed that flat and hard over long-off, a crowd-killer, that, powerfully struck
follows it up with a yorker, well bowled, Nazir had made room and he managed to dig it out into the off side
good comeback, in the blockhole again, tries to swing him over the leg side but it just escaped leg stump
misses out this time, a full toss outside off, he comes down the track and drills it hard but straight to mid-off
full and wide, moving away a hint, makes room to slice it over point, doesn't connect, those two sixes are all he could muster, they've got things back on track after a quiet first two overs
a massive heave but he's nowhere near it as it lands and zips away to the keeper
targeting the stumps, moves well across to flick it through the leg side, big inside edge onto the pads and they sneak a run
makes room and tries to cream that through the off side, gets a thick edge down towards third man for a single
in the zone, full outside off, made room and tried to crack that through the off side, missed out
Kamran's gone, tried to clear mid-on but didn't get it off the middle, chipped it to Bond who ran a few paces to his right and snapped a testing chance
fullish outside off, comes down the track and tries to smack it past the bowler, gets a thick edge down to third man for a single
the field has been pushed back but it makes no difference to Nazir who smashes that full delivery over the bowler's head to the boundary
short and wide, thinks of a cut but decides against it
he's lucky, Butler's the man he's after, short on middle, went for a mighty pull, the extra bounce worked to his advantage as it flew off the top edge over the keeper's head to the ropes
full toss and it's been dealt with, was above waist height and the umpire has called it, Nazir is merciless, making room and slicing that miles over point for a six right next to the cheerleaders
full toss again, but doesn't find the gap, strikes it on the bounce to long-off for a single
short of a good length outside off, tries to nudge it down to third man, gets an inside edge wide of fine leg
swings in, it's a length delivery and he tries to swing that into the stands, misses and it just evades off stump
change in pace, slower one, bowled shortish outside off, guided down to third man for a single
similar length but back to normal pace, tries to run that down to third man, misses
lands on a good length on middle, pushes that down to long-on for a single
in the blockhole on the off stump, comes down the track and taps it down towards long-off for one more
banged in short outside off, reaches but can't get his bat to it

the slower one does the trick, Umar was going for everything out there and tried to slog-sweep that good-length delivery over midwicket, was deceived by the pace and got the top edge, Watling, running back, took a well-judged overhead catch. His debut catch, that
firing it in on middle from round the wicket, goes for the sweep, takes the top edge and just about clears short fine
shortish on middle, punched off the back foot wide of midwicket for a single
short on middle, he deals with it appropriately, rocking back and pulling it hard over midwicket for a boundary
bowled in the blockhole outside off, dug out towards extra cover
pitched up on the off stump, driven down to long-on for a single
lands on a good length on middle, defended wide of midwicket for a single, McCullum did well to get to it but palmed it off to mid-off
pushed it off the front foot wide of extra cover for one more
unlucky, bowled it on a good length outside off and Afridi tried to close the face and drive it towards midwicket, a touch too early and ended up getting a leading edge behind point to the ropes
shortish outside off, chopped down to third man for a single
banged in short on middle, pulled down to deep square leg for a single
off the meat, slower one bowled in the slot on middle, made just a hint of room and launched that into the stands over long-on
threw it up on the off stump, came forward and defended it with bat close to pad
it's a smallish ground with short boundaries and they're taking full toll, quicker through the air but again on a length, charges down and thumps it over long-on to reach his half-century
short o the off, slapped off the back foot towards long-off for a single
Afridi miscues that one miles in the air off  failed slog-sweep and much to his good fortune, it lands safe in front of long-on
short of a length outside off, swatted down to long-off for one more
bowled short on the leg stump, tries to paddle it fine, struck high on the thighs, stifled appeal turned down
angling it towards middle and leg, gets across and tickles that delicately wide of the diving short fine for a boundary
an important wicket, lands on a good length outside off, makes room and slices it straight into the palms of Redmond at third man
short and wide, cut away hard but straight to deep point for a single
tries to be smart, gets some extra bounce and Afridi tries to guide that past the keeper but it's a touch too quick
slower one bowled full outside off, driven towards deep midwicket for a single
banged in short outside off, stands tall and knocks it down towards slip
gives it some air, bowled fullish on the off, pushed through to extra cover
tossed up again, comes down the track and smacks it hard wide of long-off for a boundary
falters, fires a wide down the leg side, called by the umpire
Afridi had already made room, chipped it between long-on and deep midwicket for a couple of runs

brilliantly taken by Southee, Afridi's staying his ground. Tossed up outside off, he took it from a good length, coming down the track, and struck it hard and flat towards long-off where Southee, taking a couple of steps coming in, snaps it inches from the ground, an excellent low catch and replays confirm it was clean
threw it up outside off, it held its line, angled it wide of point for a single
plenty of flight, comes down the track and drives it wide of long-on for a couple
short of a good length on the off, guided wide of cover, calls for a single and takes a second off the overthrow
shortish on the off stump, punched off the back foot to deep cover for a single
shortish on the off, moves across to work it down to fine leg for a single
short of a length on middle, slaps it down to deep square leg for a single
good length delivery outside off, moves across and pushes it down towards long-on for a single
short of a length, makes room and swats it down to deep cover
nicely played, a touch short, moves away and punches that between long-off and deep cover for a couple
bowled it short on the off, pulled away down to deep midwicket for a single
threw it up outside off, caressed down to deep cover for one more
shortish outside off, cut away down towards deep point for a single
Redmond imitates the Afridi celebration again! Tossed up again, lands on a length on middle and Malik drills it straight back to him and he accepts it gleefully, bending to his left
short of a length outside off, flat, cut down towards point, a tidy over
slower one bowled short outside off at 113.3 kmph, cut away straight to a diving point who concedes a single by palming it off towards cover
well played, picked the gap to perfection, bowled it short on middle and he pulled it between deep square leg and deep midwicket, placed it superbly
the slower offcutter, slightly short on the off, punched back to the bowler
hurling it on a good length on middle, pushed past the bowler for an easy single
shortish on the off, slapped down to deep cover for a single
slower one bowled on a good length on the off, guided wide of point for a single to keep the strike
picks the gap again, bowled it full on middle, Razzaq charged down and smacked it between long-on and deep midwicket for a one bounce four
overpitched outside off, drags it down to long-on for a single
full toss on the off, driven wide of long-off for a couple of runs
shortish on the off, makes room and slaps it hard to deep cover for a single
shortish outside off, cut down to deep point for another one
bowled on a good length on the off and it spins away as he tries to slog-sweep that past midwicket
shortish on the off at 137.7 kmph, guided towards third man for a single

short, Butler, who's had a bad day today, ends up taking a sharp catch at third man, it was cut hard towards him but he managed to cup it in front of his face, slipped and crashed on his back but held on
excellent bounce, shot off the pitch, an absolute snorter, races past Tanvir as he backs away
slower one bowled full on the off, pushed wide of cover for a single
a hint of reverse there, tries to force that through midwicket, is struck on the pads, would have gone down
ends an impressive spell, guided down to third man for a single
bowled short on the off, makes room and slaps it past the bowler for a single
short of a length outside off, makes way and tries to swing it over midwicket, can't connect
slow and low full toss outside off, chipped towards long-on for a single
that's disappeared, full on middle and he gets under it and clears the stands over the bowler's head with one clean strike
short and wide, makes room and manages to squeeze the in-field on the off side, knocks it hard between a diving cover and point to get it to the ropes
Tanvir gets into the act, short on the off and he pulls it into that gap between long-on and deep midwicket for a one bounce four
this guy can hit? Remember the World Twenty20 final in 2007? Short again and he connects it better this time, targeting the same gap and clearing the ropes with a brilliantly-executed pull

almost cleared the ropes again but got far more elevation than he would have wanted, in the slot on middle and he picked it well in his attempt to clear long-on but couldn't quite succeed, Nathan McCullum judged it to perfection
driven hard towards long-off for a single
pitched it up on the off, driven wide of long-off, back for the second
attempting the scoop over short-fine, it's a full toss on the off stump, gets the top edge and Franklin takes it well running to his back
